初遇.encontent: Hmmm ... Excuse me, is this the way to the audition?
初遇.content: 呃……您好，请问试镜是在这边吗？

箱中气候.encontent:
Raindrops and dance, singing under the streetlamp—Ah,
 that one classic dance in the rain.If someday I could
 be starring ...
箱中气候.content:
雨水、舞蹈，路灯下的歌曲——在雨中扶着灯柱肆意起舞
。啊～真是经典的一幕，如果有一天，我也能当上主演的
话……

致未来.encontent:
A character for me, a line for me,such a day will eventually
 come to me.
致未来.content:
一个属于我自己的角色，一句属于我自己的台词，总会有
那么一天的。

孑立.encontent:
Hello, I am Bette. I am here for the new character audition.
 I am going to present you ... No no no ... Hello, my name is
 Bette. I am here for the audition!
孑立.content:
您好，我是贝蒂，我来面试这次的新角色，下面是我准备
的……不不不……您好，我是贝蒂，我来面试这次的新角
色！

问候.encontent:
Hello, please take a seat.Oh I'm sorry. Just a minute,
 I'll find another place for these costumes right now!
问候.content:
您好，请随便坐。哦，抱歉，稍等一下，我马上就把这些
戏服挪开！

朝晨.encontent:
Oh, bacon, a big no no for all beautiful girls on the
 film crew. They envy my ability to change appearance,
 but I am so jealous of their lines.
朝晨.content:
哦，培根，剧组里漂亮姑娘的天敌。她们羡慕我可以随意
改变的身形，而我却羡慕她们嘴巴里的那些台词。

信任-朝晨.encontent:
Good morning, how do I look? Do you think I can nail today's
 audition? It's for an ordinary character and the only line is
 "Good morning". But ... it's still better than nothing!
信任-朝晨.content:
早上好，我看起来怎么样？你觉得这次的试镜我能成功吗
？那是个普通的角色，只有一句“早上好”的台词。但……但
也很好，比一句台词都没有的时候好多了！

夜暮.encontent:
Oh hello ... I didn't realize you're here. This, this
 is just a notebook. Nothing special. It's just my
 script ...
夜暮.content:
哦，你好……我没意识到你来了。这，这只是个本子。没
什么，只是我的剧本而已……

信任-夜暮.encontent:
Vagrants, forty-niners, hairdressers, winos ... every one of
 us lives a life and every night we share the sky.This is what
 films teach us. Magical, isn't it?
信任-夜暮.content:
流浪汉、淘金者、理发师、酒鬼……每个人都有自己的人
生，在夜晚都会看向同一片星空。电影能让大家明白这些
，真是神奇，不是吗？

帽檐与发鬓.encontent:
Cover my hair, blur my features! Now it's all up to
 my acting.
帽檐与发鬓.content: 盖住头发，抹去特征！接下来需要的就只有演技了。

袖与手.encontent:
Ha ha ... They might be a little rough. To tightly
 grab the eave does require abundant practice.
袖与手.content:
哈哈……它们可能有些粗糙。想要抓稳房檐，确实需要一
定时间的练习。

衣着与身形.encontent:
Before the advent of sound in films, body language
 was the only way to express emotions.See, like this!
衣着与身形.content:
在电影出现声音之前，肢体语言是传递情绪的唯一方式。看
，就像这样～

嗜好.encontent:
When I am upset, frustrated or fail the audition, I always stay
 in my bedroom going through my little notebook.The rustling
 sound of paper always helps calm me down.
嗜好.content:
当我难过，心烦意乱，或是又从试镜中落选的时候，我总
是会一个人在房间里翻我的本子。纸张的声音总是能够帮
助我放松下来。

赞赏.encontent:
Well done, perfect! Let's call it a day!Oh, sorry,
 I forgot we are not filming.
赞赏.content: 做得好，完美！收工！哦，抱歉，我忘了这不是在片场。

亲昵.encontent:
Argh, don't mind me ... I'm just observing, or imitating
 you.Just in case someday you might need a reliable
 stand-in.
亲昵.content:
呃，您不用在意我这边……我只是在观察，或者说是在模
仿您。以备有朝一日您需要一个可靠的动作替身。

闲谈Ⅰ.encontent:
Never give up, the future is bright. Everything's gonna
 be alright!
闲谈Ⅰ.content: 呼……只要不放弃，前方总有机会，一切都会好起来的！

闲谈Ⅱ.encontent:
A 720° flip and a 3½ backward somersault ... Uhh, I
 ... I am not sure ... Are these heroics really necessary?
闲谈Ⅱ.content:
“空中转体720度接向后翻腾三周半”……呃，我，我
不确定，真的会有这种难度系数的英雄救美吗？

独白.encontent:
I've dreamt forever about my first character, not as a rich young
 man, a courageous adventurer, a fair or rich lady,but the first
 character starred by me, Bette with brown hair!I have noted
 them all in this notebook, which is called "My Script."
独白.content:
我想过无数次，我的第一个角色会是什么样。不是富豪男
子，不是勇猛的冒险家，更不是窈窕淑女与富家千金，而
是贝蒂，长着棕红色头发的贝蒂——所出演的第一个角色
！我把它们都记在这个小本子里了，我称呼它为“我的剧
本”。

择选高阶咒语.encontent: And a forward roll? No problem!

释放神秘术Ⅱ.encontent: It's my duty to reduce damage!

洞悉.encontent: What? I am so very grateful for your approval!
洞悉.content: 什么？我太……感谢您的认可了！
